title: IMF Imposes Harsh Structural Adjustment on Indonesia
summary: The International Monetary Fund provides a $40 billion bailout to Indonesia with unprecedented conditions, forcing mass privatization, financial sector restructuring, and the elimination of government subsidies. These conditions systematically dismantle Indonesia's economic sovereignty, benefiting Western corporate interests.
